thread.title: Great boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jewel63
title: Great boutique hotel
text: We have stayed here several times. You can't beat the location just a block from all the action in Times Square, but very quiet. Rooms are NY small, but very nice. Marble baths, nice bedding and flat screen TVs. Library in lobby really cozy and great to have a nice coffee or tea which is complimentary. Staff is very friendly and really gives you personal attention. Highly recommend.
